spatial_accuracy.notes: Overall zoning is only partially consistent (left living area, central dining, right kitchen/playroom, central stair). Major issues: (E2/E4) room boundaries do not match the 2D outline—right side massing is skewed with an angled/perimeter geometry not present in plan; (E2) pantry/core partitions are not placed/formed like the plan’s pantry block and adjacent corridor openings; (E3) several doorways/openings shown in 2D are not represented or are in different locations (notably foyer→living, closet/WC doors, pantry door, and the dining→kitchen opening configuration). (E1/E2) Window locations are largely absent or not aligned to plan’s numerous exterior windows (living, dining, kitchen, playroom). (E4) Proportions of living/dining and the right-side kitchen/playroom appear distorted relative to the plan (rooms read squarer/larger and circulation widths differ).

structural_fidelity.notes: Wall network does not faithfully reproduce the plan. (E2) Adjacencies are partially correct (kitchen adjacent to dining/playroom; stairs central), but several partition runs and offsets/jogs are incorrect, especially on the right perimeter and the left foyer/closet/WC cluster. (E1) Multiple plan-required doors/openings are missing; (E5) a prominent angled/diagonal exterior wall segment and curved/rounded corner treatments appear that are not supported by the 2D plan. Wall thickness looks somewhat consistent but openings are not embedded where the plan indicates (E2/E3).

furniture_mapping.notes: Furniture is mostly generic placeholder blocks. (E2) Kitchen fixtures (sink/range/island) do not match the 2D kitchen layout; (E2) living/dining furniture positions do not correspond to the plan’s indicated placements. (E4) Scale is inconsistent (large blocky furniture relative to room sizes; circulation clearances not preserved).

aesthetic_quality.notes: Camera is broadly isometric-like but not cleanly orthographic (minor perspective feel). Lighting is soft and readable but detail is low. (E6) Geometry/edges appear slightly blurred and simplified; openings/windows are not well-articulated, reducing clarity. Composition is acceptable, but the model lacks crispness and architectural definition.

detected_errors.description: Right-side exterior wall layout and internal partitions do not align with the 2D plan (kitchen/perimeter massing deviates).
Hallucinated angled/diagonal perimeter geometry and rounded/curved corner treatments that are not present in the 2D floor plan.
Most exterior windows shown in the 2D plan are missing in the 3D render (living, dining, kitchen, playroom window runs).
Door placement/orientation mismatches: foyer→living, closet/WC, pantry, and dining→kitchen openings are not represented as in the plan.
Several plan-defined door openings are absent, reducing correct circulation paths between foyer/closet/WC/pantry and main rooms.
Room proportions and circulation widths appear distorted (living/dining sizing and right-side room shapes do not preserve the 2D proportions).
Pantry/core block location and geometry do not match the 2D plan’s pantry footprint and adjacent wall alignments.
Kitchen fixture layout (counter/sink/range/island) does not correspond to the 2D plan’s indicated kitchen arrangement.
Rendering/model clarity artifacts: softened/blurred edges and simplified openings reduce legibility and precision.
